actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to consider, in determining whether to approve or disapprove a project grant application submitted by an airport, whether the policy-making board of the airport includes at least 2 representatives of each State which is located within 5 miles of the airport.
short_title: Airport Board Community Representation Act of 1993

summary.text: Airport Board Community Representation Act of 1993 - Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to consider, in determining whether to approve or disapprove an airport's project grant application, whether the airport's policy-making board includes at least two representatives of each State located within five miles of the airport.

titles.title: Airport Board Community Representation Act of 1993

To amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to consider, in determining whether to approve or disapprove a project grant application submitted by an airport, whether the policy-making board of the airport includes at least 2 representatives of each State which is located within 5 miles of the airport.
